import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Navbar } from './Navbar'; export const Assignproject = () => { const [assignvalues,setAssignvalues] = useState({ projectname:"", assignto:"", description:"", deadline:"" }) const inputhandler = (event)=>{ const{name,value} = event.target; setAssignvalues({...assignvalues,[name]:value}) console.log(assignvalues) } const formsubmit = async()=>{ await fetch("http://localhost:4000/assign",{ method:"POST", body:JSON.stringify(assignvalues), headers:{ "Content-Type":"Application/json" } }).then((error,data)=>{ if(error){ console.log(error) }else{console.log("success")} }) } return ( <>
Employee Signup
) }
